item.title: [Project Insanity 317] Jarring Problems
item.dc:creator: @CarlosATheTruth CarlosATheTruth
item.description:
@CarlosATheTruth wrote:

(cachedownloader)
private final int VERSION = 1 ;
private final int pauseHandlerDelay = 1000 ; // 1000 = 1 second.
private String cacheLink = “https://www.dropbox.com/s/40p5xyks45ogg8c/Cache.zip” ; // URL of cache on remote server.

private String cacheDir = “C:/RRunescape/” ; // Local link to cache directory - Same as sign.signlink.findcachedir() - Remember trailing ‘/’

(signlink)
public static String findcachedir()
{
boolean exists = (new File(System.getProperty(“user.home”) + “/RRunescape_Cache/”)).exists();
if (exists) {
System.out.println(“Directory exists”);
return System.getProperty(“user.home”) + “/RRunescape_Cache/”;
} else {
File f = new File(System.getProperty(“user.home”) + “/RRunescape_Cache/”);
f.mkdir();
System.out.println(“Directory doesnt exist, making directory”);
return System.getProperty(“user.home”) + “/RRunescape_Cache/”;
}
}

[The “Jarring Tutorial” on moparscape told me to rename my cache folder to whatever i wanted. So i NAMED IT RRunescape

[MEDIA]

[COMMENTS]

The above are the codes that is in my cachedownloader.java , The Jarring Tutorial old me to put on, what i put, and i put on “RRunescape” and it won’t load?

Read full topic
